name: Block Dasher [Beta 1.0]
description:
!!! The game is in Beta state and in development !!!

The game is made by following Brackeys tutorial on "How to make a video game". 

The plan for the future is to add more levels and an extra game mode called "SCORE" where the goal is to get as big high score as possible. Almost like minion rush, but cheap. 

The full version will be released probably in late August or early September. 

For my fellow Estonians, there is and will be a language option for Estonian. 

----------

CONTROLS

A - Move left

D - Move Right

----------

Any ideas most commonly will help the development of the game.
